title: Copyright
publication_title: Whistler Paintings and Drawings at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:

First edition  
ISBN: 978-0-86559-310-8

Produced by the Department of Publishing at the Art Institute of Chicago  
Greg Nosan, Executive Director of Publishing  
Lisa Meyerowitz, Editorial Director  
Joseph Mohan, Director of Production

Edited by Jane Friedman, Sheila Majumdar, and Maia Rigas  
Production by Lauren Makholm, with the assistance of Ben Bertin  
Photography research by Kylie Escudero

Proofreading by David B. Olsen  
Designed by Beata Hosea  
OSCI-Toolkit and ChicagoCodeX Development by Tina Shah

The OSCI Toolkit is an open-source digital authoring and publishing platform. Find the Art Institute’s toolkit customizations and additions on github under the OSCI-Toolkit, OSCI-Toolkit-Frontend, and ChicagoCodeX repositories.

Unless otherwise noted, all overall high-resolution color, UV, IR and transmitted-IR photographs of the works in the catalogue are by Robert Lifson, Craig Stillwell, and Joe Tallarico, with postproduction by Jonathan Mathias and Owen Conway, coordinated by P. D. Young, Department of Imaging, the Art Institute of Chicago, and are copyrighted by the Art Institute of Chicago.

Additional technical and scientific images of the works in the catalogue were produced by conservators within the Department of Conservation and Science at the Art Institute of Chicago, and copyrighted by the Art Institute of Chicago. Kimberley Muir captured additional infrared, raking-light, and cross section images. Technical images were composited and registered for the interactive image overlay tool by Kelly Keegan. Technical images of works of art on paper were captured by María Cristina Rivera Ramos.

Thread-count and thread-angle maps were generated by Don H. Johnson, J. S. Abercrombie Professor Emeritus, Rice University, Houston.

</section>
